TitleEnglish: The Eminence in Shadow: Lost Echoes
SummaryEnglish: The final episode of The Eminence in Shadow 2nd Season anime just aired in Japan, and with it comes word of a theatrical feature. There isn't much in the way of info at the moment, but The Eminence in Shadow: Lost Echoes was announced as an anime film along with the first teaser visual.
Aliases: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute!: Zanky≈ç-hen
